bug.author: shendiaomo
bug.summary: We get the warning about truncated iterator in SQLFlow

comments.comment: We should consider upgrading Docker to use TensorFlow 2.0.0, it seems to be a bug of TensorFlow 2.0.0b <denchmark-link:https://stackoverflow.com/questions/50519343/how-to-cache-data-during-the-first-epoch-correctly-tensorflow-dataset>https://stackoverflow.com/questions/50519343/how-to-cache-data-during-the-first-epoch-correctly-tensorflow-dataset</denchmark-link>
